title: The sun's-darling a moral masque : as it hath been often presented at Whitehall by Their Majesties servants, and after at the Cock-pit in Drury Lane, with great applause / written by John Foard and Tho. Decker, Gent.
author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
publisher: Printed by J. Bell for Andrew Penneycuicke ...,
